title: The Vegetarian Epicure Book Two
description: Here are 325 glorious new recipes from Anna Thomas, whose fresh and delicious approach to vegetables and other fruits of the earth has made her first Vegetarian Epicure a classic -- inspiring vegetarians to new culinary heights and giving non-vegetarians a source of wonderful dishes without meat. Now she is back with a whole new and rich variety of dishes for every occasion. Her Vegetarian Epicure, Book Two -- with its forays into foreign cuisines, its menu ideas from many countries, its superb creations from her own kitchen -- will be a joy to every good cook.
author: Anna Thomas
